rows.label: qst202707_msg0001
rows.name: Everyone! How was it, mo?

rows.label: qst202707_msg0002
rows.name:
Yeah, we investigated and
found out a few things.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0003
rows.name:
The World Ruin Cult gathers on a
rooftop at night and performs a
ritual called the Purpure Altar.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0004
rows.name: Mo mo mo...

rows.label: qst202707_msg0005
rows.name:
They form a circle, lie down,
and chant a spell, apparently.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0007
rows.name:
Is it just me, or does that sound
like a super peaceful group?

rows.label: qst202707_msg0008
rows.name:
It sounds like a very
dangerous group, mo!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0009
rows.name:
Most Nopon aren't religious, mo.
Chanting spells is just weird, mo!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0010
rows.name: Is that so?

rows.label: qst202707_msg0011
rows.name: Please, everyone!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0012
rows.name:
If my daughter is in that
dangerous group, I want you
to persuade her to leave, mo!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0013
rows.name: She won't listen to me, mo.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0014
rows.name: But maybe she'll listen to you, mo!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0015
rows.name: All right. We'll help if we can.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0016
rows.name: Really, mo?! Thank you, mo!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0017
rows.name: You're okay with this, right, Mei?

rows.label: qst202707_msg0018
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Fine. I've always wanted to
try beating up a delinquent
girl to straighten her out.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0019
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]We're persuading her first.

rows.label: qst202707_msg0020
rows.name:
Yeah, yeah...[ML:Dash ] So, what's
your daughter's name?

rows.label: qst202707_msg0021
rows.name: It's Mimumu, mo!

rows.label: qst202707_msg0022
rows.name: All right! Then let's go save Mimumu!
